mapper.select: WITH RankedPlans AS ( SELECT p.PLAN_NUM, p.PLAN_DATE, p.PLAN_TITLE, -- Added this line to select the plan_title pas.PLAN_AREA_SEQ, pd.PLAN_DATE_START, pd.PLAN_DATE_END, pa.PLAN_AREA_LATI, pa.PLAN_AREA_LONG, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY p.PLAN_NUM ORDER BY p.PLAN_DATE) AS rn FROM PLAN p LEFT JOIN PLAN_AREA_SEQ pas ON p.PLAN_NUM = pas.PLAN_NUM LEFT JOIN PLAN_DATE pd ON p.PLAN_NUM = pd.PLAN_NUM LEFT JOIN plan_area pa ON p.PLAN_NUM = pa.PLAN_NUM WHERE p.MEM_ID = #{mem_id} ) SELECT PLAN_NUM, PLAN_DATE, PLAN_TITLE, -- Also added here to include it in the final result PLAN_AREA_SEQ, PLAN_DATE_START, PLAN_DATE_END, PLAN_AREA_LATI, PLAN_AREA_LONG FROM RankedPlans WHERE rn = 1 ORDER BY PLAN_NUM desc

SELECT p.PLAN_NUM, MAX(p.PLAN_TITLE) AS PLAN_TITLE, MAX(p.PLAN_DATE) AS PLAN_DATE, MAX(m.MEM_NICK) AS MEM_NICK, MAX(pa.PLAN_AREA_NUM) AS PLAN_AREA_NUM, MAX(pas.PLAN_AREA_SEQ) AS PLAN_AREA_SEQ, MAX(pd.PLAN_DATE_DAY) AS PLAN_DATE_DAY, MAX(pa.PLAN_AREA_NAME) AS PLAN_AREA_NAME, MAX(pa.PLAN_AREA_LATI) AS PLAN_AREA_LATI, MAX(pa.PLAN_AREA_LONG) AS PLAN_AREA_LONG, MAX(pd.PLAN_DATE_START) AS PLAN_DATE_START, MAX(pd.PLAN_DATE_END) AS PLAN_DATE_END FROM PLAN p JOIN PLAN_AREA pa ON p.PLAN_NUM = pa.PLAN_NUM JOIN MEMBER m ON p.MEM_ID = m.MEM_ID JOIN PLAN_AREA_SEQ pas ON p.PLAN_NUM = pas.PLAN_NUM JOIN PLAN_DATE pd ON p.PLAN_NUM = pd.PLAN_NUM WHERE pa.CITY_NUM = #{city_num} GROUP BY p.PLAN_NUM ORDER BY p.PLAN_NUM DESC
